title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, August 30, 2020
description: It was on this day in 30 B.C. that Queen Cleopatra of Egypt killed herself with a snake rather than remain the prisoner of Octavian.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 30 B.C. that Queen Cleopatra of Egypt killed herself with a snake rather than remain the prisoner of Octavian.
